sentences.english: The two coats are of the same colour.
The present invention involves bilayers that include cesium tungsten oxide as an infrared absorbing agent.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及包含作为红外线吸收剂的氧化铯钨的双层。

sentences.english: My company uses cs-cart shopping cart system which is open source.
sentences.chinese: 我的公司使用铯车购物车系统是开源的。

sentences.english: Theoretical design of the dipole cesium beam tube is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了二极型密封铯束管的理论设计。

sentences.english: Radioactive cesium has a tendency to bind with earth, and flow along with silt in water.
sentences.chinese: 放射性铯往往会与土壤结合在一起，随泥沙顺水而下。

sentences.english: And an ytterbium clock has the potential to be even more accurate and stable than the cesium chronometer.
sentences.chinese: 镱原子钟甚至可能比铯原子钟更加精确和稳定。

sentences.english: This paper describes an effective improvement for the emissive properties of the Ag-O-Cs photocathode by repeated evaporation of silver.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了复蒸银对银氧铯阴极发射性质的重大改进。

sentences.english: A method for the determination of cesium in silver catalyst by FAAS is described.
sentences.chinese: 利用火焰原子吸收光谱法测定银催化剂中的铯。

sentences.english: In this artical, the structure and performance of the new hexa- pole cesium beam tube are presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文简略介绍了一种新的六极型铯束管的结构和性能。

sentences.english: Once dispersed in the environment, it says, cesium-137 “is impossible to avoid.”
sentences.chinese: 它说，铯一旦分散到自然界中，就不可能被人们避免。

sentences.english: Radioactive cesium has also been detected, but at lower activity concentrations.
sentences.chinese: 此外还发现了放射性铯，但放射性浓度较低。

sentences.english: Radioactive caesium has also been detected.
Sorption of Sr, Cs on the attapulgite clays treated with modifier is especially notable under the alkali amd oxidative condition.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明凹凸棒石粘土对铯的吸附能力优于锶。

sentences.english: The reclamation of formate cesium was initially discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 就甲酸铯盐回收利用，本文也进行了初步的探讨。

sentences.english: Under separate conditions of saturation, cesium atoms in the laser beam was photoionized and detected.
sentences.chinese: 在饱和条件下，激光束里的铯原子均被电离并被检出。

sentences.english: This paper describes an effective improvement of the emissive properties of the Ag-O-Cs photocathode by repeating evaporation silver.
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述了复蒸银对银氧铯阴极发射性质的改进。

definition: see 釕銱兒|钌铞儿[liao4 diao4 r5]/Taiwan pr. [liao3]
deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
